H

handleAnswer() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientHandler
this is the method that handles the action the client requests to do. it receives a message from the client containing the action that they want to perform, then manages that action by either performing it by calling the right methods or by sending a denial.
handleAnswerToProduction(ProductionActionMessage, Client) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CommandLine
handles the final message from the server after sending the production selections, which is either a success or a failure
handleEndTurnRequest() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientHandler
method that handles the end of turn of a player, if the main action has already been performed a ""operation succesful" message is sent if the main action has not been performed yet a "operation denied" message is sent instead
handleInBetweenActionBuyACard(Client, GameStatusUpdate) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CommandLine
after the first message is sent (containing the selected card) this method handles whether the action can continue or not.
handleLastTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientHandler
 
handleMarket(Client, int, boolean, GameStatusUpdate) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CommandLine
method used inside printMarbleMarket to send the message to the server and to handle additional communication necessities that may surge
handleNotStoredResources(Storage, boolean[], int[], ClientHandler) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientHandler
method that handles the case 2) of the goToMarketAction, that requires a player to select a new level for a type of resource that is not stored in any storage level at that given moment. the interaction is repeated for every resource that needs to be stored or discarded, until either the storage is full of other types of resources or the all the types are handled. after the action is finished a "end" message is sent to the client
handleProductionAnswer(ProductionActionMessage, GameStatusUpdate, Client) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.cli.CommandLine
handles the first case where the server either sends a request to know which productions to activate (AVAILABLE_PRODUCTIONS) or a denial of action (UNAVAILABLE_ACTION) the server answers unavailable action if the resources are 0 or the resources are less then 2 and no leader or development card is acquired by the client
handleProductionSelection(String, boolean[]) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientHandler
handles all the logic and the last message to send back to the client.
handleSomeoneFinishedMoment() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ClientHandler
 
hasPlayerFinished() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
method that checks if a player has reached an end game status
hasSomeoneFinished() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.MatchMultiPlayer
method that checks if any player has reached an endGame condition (faithmarker ==24 or number of development cards==7)
hello_world - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.gui
 
hello_world() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.gui.hello_world
